Poetic Translation: Alle now we sing with luya.

Direct Translation: Alle making noise sing with luia.
Poetic Translation: Alle with the drum and lyre we sing with luya.

Lyrics: Alle cordevoto Deo toto psallite cum luya.
Direct Translation: Alle with heart entirely devoted to God sing with luia.
Poetic Translation: Alle with our hearts to God devoted now we sing with luya.
